mapper.select: SELECT INNER_CODE_NAME FROM COM_INNER_CODE WHERE COM_CODE = 'ACC-TYP'

update.foreach: UPDATE COM_CODE_ACCOUNT SET ACC_NAME = #{vo.accName}, ACC_TYPE = #{vo.accType}, ACC_ADDRESS = #{vo.accAddress}, ACC_TEL = #{vo.accTel} WHERE ACC_CODE = #{vo.accCode}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ACC_CODE, A.PROD_CODE AS ITEM_CODE,A.PROD_NAME AS ITEM_NAME,PROD_STD AS ITEM_STD,PROD_UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT FROM (SELECT * FROM BNS_CONTRACT JOIN BNS_CONTRACT_DETAIL USING(CONT_CODE)) A JOIN COM_CODE_PROD B ON (A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE) UNION SELECT ACC_CODE, A.PROD_CODE AS ITEM_CODE,A.PROD_NAME AS ITEM_NAME,PROD_STD AS ITEM_STD,PROD_UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT FROM (SELECT * FROM BNS_ORDER JOIN BNS_ORDER_DETAIL USING(ORD_CODE)) A JOIN COM_CODE_PROD B ON (A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE) UNION SELECT ACC_CODE, A.MAT_CODE AS ITEM_CODE,A.MAT_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, MAT_STD AS ITEM_STD,MAT_UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT FROM (SELECT * FROM MAT_ORDER JOIN MAT_ORDER_HEADER USING(MAT_ORDERNUM)) A JOIN COM_CODE_MAT B ON (A.MAT_CODE = B.MAT_CODE)) WHERE ACC_CODE = #{accCode}

select.if: SELECT * FROM COM_CODE_ACCOUNT WHERE ACC_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{accName} ||'%'
SELECT * FROM COM_CODE_ACCOUNT WHERE ACC_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{accName} ||'%' AND ACC_TYPE = #{accType}
